entry.title: Go Conference 2021 Autumn (Online)
entry.content:
Go Conference Tokyo is one of the earliest Go conferences. We hold the event half annually, and the latest will be on November 13rd, 2021.

The date or time schedule may be changed.

entry.title: Go Conference 2021 Autumn Online After Party
entry.content:
GoConference2021 AfterParty Go Conference is one of the earliest Go conferences. We hold the event half annually, and the latest will be on November 13th, 2021.

The conference has a session part (2 tracks on YouTube Live) and a networking part (on Remo, a conference system). The networking part has a hands-on booth and company booths. The after party also will be held on Remo. This page is registration page for the networking part (including the after party).

You must register the session part before register to the networking part on this page. You can register the session part via this link.

What is Remo? / Remo ã¨ã¯

Remo is a conference system which provides virtual event spaces. The space is divided into multiple floors and each floor has tables. Attendees can join a table and talk with other attendees in the table. You can check how to use Remo by Remo 101.

We need your E-mail address to send invitations of Remo.
